item.title: Proxyless gRPC load balancing in Kubernetes
item.author: Asish Soudhamma
item.description: In this post, I will show how you can build a proxy-less load balancing for your gRPC services using the new xDS load balancing. You can find the complete code for this experiment in asishrs/proxyless-grpc-lb Why is load balancing in gRPC difficult? If you are building gRPC based applications, you may already be aware of the usage of HTTP2 in gRPC. If you are unfamiliar with that, please read below
